description: The project's architecture is centered around an `Agent Orchestrator` that acts as the central intelligence, coordinating user interactions, managing conversational context, and delegating tasks to specialized tools and the Large Language Model (LLM). The `User Interface` serves as the primary communication channel, facilitating user commands and displaying results. `Conversation Memory` maintains the historical context of interactions, while the `LLM Interface` handles all communication with the underlying language model. A `Tool Manager` dispatches requests to various `File System Tools` and `Code Analysis Tools` for external operations. All components rely on the `Configuration Manager` for retrieving necessary application, LLM, and tool-specific settings. This design promotes modularity, allowing for independent development and maintenance of each component.

components.name: Agent Orchestrator
components.description: The core intelligence, interpreting user requests, orchestrating reasoning, and coordinating interactions.

components.name: User Interface
components.description: Manages all user input and output, acting as the primary communication channel.

components.name: Conversation Memory
components.description: Stores and retrieves the history of interactions, providing essential conversational context.

components.name: LLM Interface
components.description: Encapsulates all communication with the Large Language Model, handling prompts and responses.

components.name: Tool Manager
components.description: A central registry and dispatcher for all external tools and actions the agent can perform.

components.name: File System Tools
components.description: Provides actions for interacting with the file system (read, write, list files).

components.name: Code Analysis Tools
components.description: Integrates with static analysis tools (e.g., Pylint) for code quality evaluation.

components.name: Configuration Manager
components.description: Manages application settings, API keys, and environment variables.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)

components_relations.relation: Facilitates user interaction and command processing.
